Info.text: The name Tyrannosaurus means king of the tyrant lizards
Trex believed to have had the strongest bite of any land animal roughly 12,814 pounds of force
Trex was given its names in 1905 by Henry Fairfield
The name Parasaurolophus means: Near Crested Lizard
Parasaurolophus has an estimated length of 31 feet
Parasaurolophus has an estimated weight of 2.8 tons
The Triceratops can be up to 9 meters long or 29.52 feet
Triceratops weighed around 12 metric tons or 12,000 kilograms
The Triceratops can run up to 32 kilometers per hour
